metadata.title: CVE-2020-12474 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Telegram Desktop through 2.0.1, Telegram through 6.0.1 for Android, andTelegram through 6.0.1 for iOS allow an IDN Homograph attack via Punycodein a public URL or a group chat invitation URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12474` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

telegram-desktop - 2.1.0+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.0+ds-1').
